game_description: Conjure Cards places you in the world of Sun Shard, where magic flows through every aspect of life; even in a simple card game! Summon a wide variety of creatures and magic spells to face your opponents! Take their health points down to zero to win the game. Conjure Cards features multiplayer and singleplayer gameplay, and supports Hand Tracking allowing you to set the controllers down and still enjoy the game! Unlock new cosmetics to show off to your friends and enemies! This is an "Early" release of the game, with many more features, customizations, and exciting ways to play coming soon.
review_1: I would give it 5 stars if I could actually use the multiplayer,you cant join a game at all,you have to host one and I've gotten one game in it,I think against one of the developers and it was awesome but I had to sit there for a good probably hour till it finally happened and realistically that's crazy and not something a normal person is going to do.
review_2: Multiplayer works, you just need a friend who plays at the same time. It would be great if the multiplayer also had voice chat.
review_3: Would be so much better if multiplayer actually worked as advertised?

review_5: Iv tried to find matches several weeks in a row and it seems no developer progress, so im over it unfortunately. Seems abandoned, there's no point in releasing a multiplayer game before multi is enabled, all you do is lose players
